desc: Your dream is to become the leader of whatever field you enter. Whether it is in business, community, or in your general area of expertise, you are driven to be the reigning figure.
Heart's Desire (also called Soul Urge) - You want peace and harmony in all aspects of your life.
Heart's Desire - You love a good time.
Heart's Desire (sometimes called Soul Urge) - You like to live a stable, well organized life.
Your 5 Heart's Desire (also called Soul Urge) - Freedom is essential for your happiness.
Your 6 Heart's Desire - Your attention is directed to helping and caring for those you love.
Your 7 Heart's Desire (also called Soul Urge) - You love knowledge, study, and insight.
Your 8 Heart's Desire (also called Soul Urge) - You want success in its fullest meaning.
Your 9 Heart's Desire (also called Soul Urge) - You want to be of service to the world.
